```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
library(flexdashboard)
```

### Chart 1
```{r, echo = FALSE,warning=FALSE}
data("instacart")
instacart%>%
  group_by(aisle) %>%
  count() %>%
  arrange(n) %>%
filter(n >10000) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(aisle = fct_reorder(aisle, n)) %>%
  plot_ly(x= ~aisle, y=~n, type = "bar", color = ~aisle)

```

### Chart 2
```{r, echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE}
instacart%>% 
   mutate(order_dow = recode(order_dow, 
                           "0" ="Sunday",
                           "1" ="Monday",
                           "2" ="Tuseday",
                           "3" ="Wednesday",
                           "4" = "Thursday",
                           "5" = "Friday",
                           "6" = "Saturday")) %>%
  filter(aisle %in% c("fresh vegetables", "fresh fruits", "packaged vegetables fruits")) %>%
   group_by(aisle, order_dow) %>%
     count() %>%
 plot_ly(x=~order_dow, y = ~n, color = ~aisle, type = "scatter", mode = "line")
           
```
 
 
 
### Chart 3


```{r, echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE}
instacart %>%
  group_by(department) %>%
  plot_ly(y = ~order_hour_of_day, color = ~ department, type = "box")
```
